exam.question: Many scientists remain ______ about the value of this research program.

answer.explain: 句意： 许多科学家仍怀疑这一研究项目的科学价值。stationary： 固定的； spacious： 广阔的； specific： 明确的。

sentences.sContent: I think going in they were very skeptical we would get to this point given our history in Seattle.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think going in they were very skeptical we would get to this point given our history in Seattle.
sentences.sCn: 我想鉴于西雅图过去的历史，在开始的时候他们对我们能达到这个地步还是有怀疑的。

sentences.sContent: Though this is a skeptical age, and our faith has weakened, our confidence in some aspects of the traditional culture should and would never be lost.
sentences.sContent_eng: Though this is a skeptical age, and our faith has weakened, our confidence in some aspects of the traditional culture should and would never be lost.
sentences.sCn: 尽管这是一个怀疑的时代，我们的信心削弱了，我们的信心在某些方面的传统文化应该也不会丢失。

sentences.sContent: As much as we would like to have the remains of actual dinosaur tissue, there are sound reasons for being skeptical of the identifications made in the reading.
sentences.sContent_eng: As much as we would like to have the remains of actual dinosaur tissue, there are sound reasons for being skeptical of the identifications made in the reading.
sentences.sCn: 尽管我们都希望这些化石是真正的恐龙组织，但是还是有一些很有说服力的理由让我们怀疑阅读部分的发现。

sentences.sContent: ...I confess I enter this in a skeptical frame of mind...
...Why is the author skeptical of the data revolution...
...skeptical of whether they could trust their employees to work to full capacity without supervision...

synos.tran: 怀疑的；怀疑论的，不可知论的

words.tran: 怀疑论者；怀疑者；无神论者
